name: InToIn
description:
intoin is run game.

It is the first game made with Unity.

How to play...

spacebar - jump(press the key momentarily - low jump)

LShift - Dash(0.5s delay)

You start on the 1 floor and when you reach the 9 floor you clear the game.

The higher the floor, the harder the obstacles are.

Download

if you want small data,  download the second(non-background)

Thank you.
